import React, { Component } from "react"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import seachicon from "../img/seachicon.svg"; import likeDel from "../img/likeDel.svg"; import Order from "./Order"; export default function Like({ like, colorMap, getLike, useInput, getValue, getOrder, clearLike, }) { const settings = { infinite: false, arrows: false, vertical: true, verticalSwiping: true, slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 2, }; return (

Your Like

{like.length} pokemon
{like.length ? ( {like .filter((item) => item.name.toLowerCase().includes(useInput)) .map((res) => { return (

  • {res.name}

    {res.types[0].type.name} {res.types[1] && res.types[1].type.name}
  • {(res.weight / 10).toFixed(1)}kg {(res.height / 10).toFixed(1)}m
  • {res.id < 10 ? `0${res.id}` : `${res.id}`}
  • pokemon encyclopedia
  • getLike(res.id)}>
); })} ) : (

좋아하는 포켓몬을 추가하세요.

); }
